text: Transgender women are women who were assigned male at birth, and now live as women. Discrimination against transgender women includes, but is not limited to: * Not allowing a transgender woman to use the female bathroom, regardless of whether they "pass" or not. * Treating transgender women as different from cisgender women in an unnecessary context - for example, in day-to-day life, where being transgender has no relevance. Category:Discrimination Category:Transgender
title: Discrimination against transgender women
